summary: "Die Another Day" is a 2002 James Bond movie, the 20th in the series. Directed by Lee Tamahori and starring Pierce Brosnan as Bond, the film celebrates the franchise's 40th anniversary. It follows Bond as he hunts a traitor and a billionaire linked to a North Korean operative. With Halle Berry as NSA agent Jinx, it's the first Bond film to feature John Cleese as Q. Despite mixed reviews, it was the highest-grossing Bond film at the time.
title: Die Another Day
